entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
